alert.note: Alert for Burke; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Burke, Richmond and southwestern Aiken Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hephzibah, or 9 miles south of Fort Gordon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Waynesboro, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, Hephzibah, Jackson, Glendale, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Augusta Regional Airport, Augusta National Golf Club, McBean, Blythe, West End Augusta and New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia near mile marker 199. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
